images.description: A serene view of a small island with a church on top, connected to the mainland by a winding path, set against the ocean.
images.question: Is it more like an artistic photo or a promotional one?

images.description: A diver explores a sunken shipwreck near a coral reef underwater, the diver has a pair of swimming flippers on and is wearing an oxygen tank. The image is shown to be underwater.
images.question: How old does the shipwreck look.

images.description: A group of humpback whales is breaching with their mouths open in the ocean, with a seagull flying overhead.
images.question: Is there a boat?

images.description: A bowl of Asian noodle salad with vegetables and herbs.
images.question: Is it like a real meal or some meme?
